 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Larabros\Elogram\Providers;
 4: 
 5: use GuzzleHttp\HandlerStack;
 6: use League\Container\ServiceProvider\AbstractServiceProvider;
 7: use League\OAuth2\Client\Token\AccessToken;
 8: 
 9: /**
10:  * MiddlewareServiceProvider
11:  *
12:  * @package    Elogram
13:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
14:  * @link       https://github.com/larabros/elogram
15:  * @license    MIT
16:  */
17: class MiddlewareServiceProvider extends AbstractServiceProvider
18: {
19:     /**
20:      * The provides array is a way to let the container
21:      * know that a service is provided by this service
22:      * provider. Every service that is registered via
23:      * this service provider must have an alias added
24:      * to this array or it will be ignored.
25:      *
26:      * @var array
27:      */
28:     protected $provides = [
29:         HandlerStack::class
30:     ];
31: 
32:     /**
33:      * Use the register method to register items with the container via the
34:      * protected $this->container property or the `getContainer` method
35:      * from the ContainerAwareTrait.
36:      *
37:      * @return void
38:      */
39:     public function register()
40:     {
41:         $container = $this->getContainer();
42:         $config    = $container->get('config');
43: 
44:         $container->share(HandlerStack::class, function () {
45:             return HandlerStack::create();
46:         });
47: 
48:         // If access token was provided, then instantiate and add to middleware
49:         if ($config->has('access_token')
50:             && $config->get('access_token') !== null
51:         ) {
52: 
53:             // Convert the JSON serialized token into an `AccessToken` instance.
54:             $config->set(
55:                 'access_token',
56:                 new AccessToken(json_decode($config->get('access_token'), true))
57:             );
58: 
59:         }
60: 
61:         $this->addMiddleware();
62: 
63:     }
64: 
65:     protected function addMiddleware()
66:     {
67:         $container = $this->getContainer();
68:         $config    = $container->get('config');
69:         $stack     = $container->get(HandlerStack::class);
70: 
71:         foreach ($config->get('middleware') as $name => $class) {
72:             $stack->push($class::create($config), $name);
73:         }
74:     }
75: }
76:
